languages.text: "Разве это проблема? Ты ведь не собираешься меня... ну, не знаю... убить? Это было бы очень неразумно. Раньше ты мог{mf||ла} получить всякое барахло для выживания у Злобы, но теперь я за него. Кто же достанет тебе хорошее оружие, стимуляторы, броню?"

"Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"
languages.original_text: "Разве это проблема? Ты ведь не собираешься меня... ну, не знаю... убить? Это было бы очень неразумно. Раньше ты мог{mf||ла} получить всякое барахло для выживания у Злобы, но теперь я за него. Кто же достанет тебе хорошее оружие, стимуляторы, броню?"

traits.locale_text: "Is it a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Is it a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “这算得上麻烦吗？你该不会打算……怎么说呢……打算杀了我吧？这恐怕就太不明智了。你那些补给品原本是恶棍给你的，但如今，我接管了这个地方。如果你杀了我，还有谁能为你提供优质的武器、兴奋剂、盔甲呢？”
languages.original_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"

traits.locale_text: “这算得上麻烦吗？你该不会打算……怎么说呢……打算杀了我吧？这恐怕就太不明智了。你那些补给品原本是恶棍给你的，但如今，我接管了这个地方。如果你杀了我，还有谁能为你提供优质的武器、兴奋剂、盔甲呢？”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「残念？そんな…まさか…私を殺すつもりではないでしょう？そんなことをしたら損するのはそちらです。以前はマリスがあなたたちに生き残るための物資を調達してくれたでしょうが、今はこの私がこの場を仕切っています。私を殺したらいい武器も、増強剤も、防具も手に入りませんよ？」
languages.original_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"

traits.locale_text: 「残念？そんな…まさか…私を殺すつもりではないでしょう？そんなことをしたら損するのはそちらです。以前はマリスがあなたたちに生き残るための物資を調達してくれたでしょうが、今はこの私がこの場を仕切っています。私を殺したらいい武器も、増強剤も、防具も手に入りませんよ？」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¿Supone eso un problema? No irá a... no sé... matarme, ¿verdad? Eso sería una insensatez. Malicia era la persona que podía darle lo que necesitaba para sobrevivir, pero ahora soy yo quien ostenta ese puesto. Si me mata, ¿cómo va a conseguir armas, estimulantes y armaduras de calidad?».
languages.original_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Supone eso un problema? No irá a... no sé... matarme, ¿verdad? Eso sería una insensatez. Malicia era la persona que podía darle lo que necesitaba para sobrevivir, pero ahora soy yo quien ostenta ese puesto. Si me mata, ¿cómo va a conseguir armas, estimulantes y armaduras de calidad?».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"

languages.text: « Est-ce que c'est vraiment un problème ? Vous n'avez pas l'intention de... me tuer, si ? Ce ne serait pas très malin. Avant, quand on avait besoin de trucs pour survivre, c'était à Démon qu'il fallait s'adresser. Maintenant, c'est à moi. Si vous me tuez, qui vous fournira des armes, des stimulants ou de l'équipement ? »
languages.original_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce que c'est vraiment un problème ? Vous n'avez pas l'intention de... me tuer, si ? Ce ne serait pas très malin. Avant, quand on avait besoin de trucs pour survivre, c'était à Démon qu'il fallait s'adresser. Maintenant, c'est à moi. Si vous me tuez, qui vous fournira des armes, des stimulants ou de l'équipement ? »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ist das ein Problem? Ihr werdet mich doch nicht ... ich weiß nicht ... töten, oder? Das wäre höchst unklug. Tücke hat immer besorgt, was man zum Überleben braucht, aber jetzt habe ich übernommen. Wenn Ihr mich tötet, wer liefert Euch dann gute Waffen, Stimulanzien, Rüstung?"
languages.original_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"

traits.locale_text: "Ist das ein Problem? Ihr werdet mich doch nicht ... ich weiß nicht ... töten, oder? Das wäre höchst unklug. Tücke hat immer besorgt, was man zum Überleben braucht, aber jetzt habe ich übernommen. Wenn Ihr mich tötet, wer liefert Euch dann gute Waffen, Stimulanzien, Rüstung?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Bu sorun mu ki? Yani beni... Ne bileyim... Öldürmeyeceksin ya? Pek akıllıca olmaz çünkü. Sana hayatta kalmanı sağlayan şeyleri tedarik eden Melanet'ti ama artık işleri ben devraldım. Beni öldürürsen iyi silahtır, uyarıcıdır, zırhtır, bunları sana kim sağlayacak?"
languages.original_text: "Is that a problem? You're not going to... I don't know... kill me, are you? That would be most unwise. Malice used to be the one who could get you things to survive, but now I've taken over. If you kill me, who will supply you with good weapons, stimulants, armour?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir problem mi bu? Gidip beni... Ne bileyim... Öldürmeyeceksin, değil mi? Pek akıllıca olmaz çünkü. Sana hayatta kalmanı sağlayan şeyleri tedarik eden Melanet'ti ama şimdi işleri ben devraldım. Beni öldürürsen sana iyi silahtır, uyarıcıdır, zırhtır, kim sağlayacak?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
